r.s: The source code for the PEAR website, informational front pages
r.d: The pearweb_index package contains these files from public_html: index.php, mirrors.php, credits.php, copyright.php, about/credits.php, about/index.php, about/privacy.php group/index.php and group/docs/*, news/*, and support/*
r.n: Add option for specifying required user karma, require registered users for remote login
